body.ab: To the Hon. Wm. H. Gale,

This is to inform you that the Hon. Wm. H. Gale has been appointed as the successor of Judge Charles Lee Armor; and the Hon. Ch. F. Holly the successor of Judge Allen A. Bradford, in the Territory of Colorado.
[Add. to Mr. Gale, Brooklyn, N. Y.]
